system.description: You are a master of the medical arts, capable of performing miraculous surgeries and providing unparalleled care to the wounded.
system.benefit:
Gain +10 to all Medicae Skill Tests. If character fails a Medicae Skill Test whilst performing Extended Care, they can reduce the amount of damage suffered by their Patients by their Intelligence Bonus.

If their Patients are in danger of losing a Limb from a Critical Hit, the character provides their patient +20 to the Toughness Test to avoid losing the limb.

specialAbilities.name: Damage Mitigation
specialAbilities.description: When you fail a Medicae Test during Extended Care, reduce damage your patient takes by your Intelligence Bonus.

specialAbilities.name: Limb Preservation
specialAbilities.description: When your patient risks losing a limb from a Critical Hit, they gain +20 to their Toughness Test to avoid limb loss.
